name: E-Ternal Cold
description:
This game was made for the #160 Trijam, whose theme was "Don't turn it off".

Welcome to E-Ternal Cold!

You are in an unknown area, which is VERY cold. Luckily, you've got your E-Fire handy! However, there's one problem... The E-Fire is one of those terribly-designed machines which automatically turns itself off after some time!

You must make sure the E-Fire does not turn itself off, or else you will freeze to death! 

Collect as many batteries(for an undisclosed purpose) as possible, while avoiding the Yetis, who will stun you!

Controls and Instructions:

Use the WASD or Arrow Keys to move around.

Walk into the E-Fire in the centre of the map to increase its time by 1.5 seconds. (You can walk into it repeatedly to increase the time very far)

Collect the batteries(shining rectangles) and avoid the yetis(white-blue circles).

Get as high a score as you can!

Music by the Classified Composer.
